title: To permit Club House, open play Grounds and other recreational purposes as normally permissible under green zone with permissible FSI as per these Regulations
clause_text: To permit Club House, open play Grounds and other recreational purposes as normally permissible under green zone with permissible FSI as per these Regulations. To insist plantation at the rate of two fast growing trees per 100 sq.m. of land under development.
section: Regulations for G-1 Zone (Yeur village Section - VII only)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: To permit Club House, open play Grounds and other recreational purposes as normally permissible under green zone with permissible FSI as per these Regulations.
